title: The Lost Key of Dawn
content: Mira woke up to find a mysterious golden key shimmering on her bedside table. Each day it grew warmer, whispering secrets only she could hear. One morning, it finally led her to an ancient door hidden in the forest—where her true destiny was waiting.
excerpt: A tiny golden key appears in a girl’s pocket every morning, glowing brighter with each sunrise.
